suppress.notes: file name: mailapi-1.5.6.jar, false positive reported: https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/912

false positive reported: https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/987 CVE-2016-5425 and CVE-2016-6325 are permission issue packages of Linux distributions, not affecting this project which only uses embedded Tomcat for Spring boot CVE-2017-6056 fixed in https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1422148 says CVE-2017-6056 fixed since tomcat 8.0.19
